segments.text: This is the White Rose Restaurant.May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to make reservation for tonight , a table for five , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your name please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Frank London . Any chance of a table by the window ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have received many bookings.But we'll try our best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll appreciate it if it could be arranged .
segments.speaker: S2
